attributes.action: Stop David Cameron taking part in comic relief ( Children in need )
attributes.additional_details: This is just sickening that He is taking part in this event, when He and the coalition are sending some many in to total poverty, and show His face on this program. I couldn't even say I would pay more if He didn't appear in the show, I wouldn't want His name attached to it in anyway. What a hypocrite. BBc get You head together over this one ??
